dialogue: Welcome Nutri-Sprinter!! Oh mother of apples, you look like you have been eating a lot of junk food! Did you know that in the long term, junk food can lead to type 2 diabetes?
Dont worry! The great applin is here to help. To start off, why not collect those fruits and vegetables on the ground? They provide a lot of vitamins and minerals.
Do avoid the french fries that are coming towards you as they contain a lot of fats! Also thanks to AI advancement that is taking over our jobs, you can now teleport!
The second bar represents how soon you can teleport and as for the third bar... well we will probably find some use for it later on
Thats enough from me. Go out and start your fruity adventure in the fields. Stay healthy kids!
Oh that was fast. Oh wow you look so much better and fresher now! Glad to see that you are eating healthily! Wait a minute... Did you just change genders? Never mind, no judging here...
Anyways, welcome to the jungle. Looks like theres bananas here for you to eat. They are rich in nutrients and also helps in improving blood sugar levels.
If you have been eating a lot of junk food lately, its probably time to eat some bananas to get back your health. Good luck!
Wow. Nice haircut hot shot. But you do look more healthy and fit though. Think you're up for this level?
I am not sure why but the simulation glitched out and now we are in KFC. This place is full of grease and smells bad. You need to hurry up and find a way out of here
Looks like those Zinger burgers are in the way. They shoot out fried chicken that can bypass the rules of this world too!! They also move faster than the fries which makes them a bigger threat.
We can finally make use of the mysterious third bar too now! Those cherries over there is the key to getting rid of those fatty bastards.
Collect enough of these and you will release a fart so bad that it destroys everything around you, sadly including the greens
Did you know cherries also help improve sleep quality? Thats killing multiple birds with one stone!
Alright, enough yapping from me. Continue eating healthy and I will check on you later. Have fun!
Woah.. you look like a totally new person. I guess this is what they call ascension. Look at those chiseled abs, pretty solid for a ghost.
It seems like the world just ended, and - wait what? you're hungry? Well, looks like you still have to eat your veggies even after death. HAHAHAHHAHAH
How convenient. Well, let's see how much food you can eat. Time doesn't pass here as well so try your best to eat as much fruits and veggies as possible
This is the great yapper applin signing out. And remember, an apple a day keeps the fatties away.
